definitions.definition: To yield, make or manufacture; to generate.
To make (a thing) available to a person, an authority, etc.; to provide for inspection.
To sponsor and present (a motion picture, etc) to an audience or to the public.
To extend an area, or lengthen a line.
definitions.example: to produce a side of a triangle

definitions.definition: To draw out; to extend; to lengthen or prolong.
definitions.example: to produce a man's life to threescore

definitions.definition: To alter using technology, as opposed to simply performing.
